mean_cn: n.媒体（medium的复数形式）；  adj.媒体的，与媒体有关的
mean_en: the main ways that large numbers of people receive information and entertainment, that is television, radio, newspapers and the Internet
sentence: These days we get information from all kinds of different media.
sentence_trans: 如今，我们从各种不同的媒体获取信息。
